snippet: A pact is considered unlikely, but the desire for economic growth could overcome political problems.
abstract: Many experts say European Union trade agreement with United States faces long odds, as both sides have conflicting goals; desire for economic growth could overcome political problems, however; officials say they hope to conclude deal by November 2014.

byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: A pact is considered unlikely, but the desire for economic growth could overcome political problems.

headline.main: Conflicting Goals Complicate an Effort to Forge a Trans-Atlantic Trade Deal
headline.print_headline: Conflicting Goals Complicate an Effort To Forge a Trans-Atlantic Trade Deal
